Message.Title: Alibaba IPO will be announced soon
Message.Msg: Shorts can either deny it or accept the reality. If they accept the latter, they will be saved and if they pick the former, they will be toasted. My take it will be announced this month. It will be huge about $60B to $100B IPO valuation. Unfortunately we have many diehard and hardheaded shorts here like dr.glooom, hotmodel, new shorts like mickey dicttes, and madmilk. I see $30 to $35 YHOO this year.

Topic.Title: Big time Q2 Report put YHOO to new High

Message.Msg: not going to happen until next year. Too much hot money in yahoo and it is way too early for the new Yahoo properties to bring in money. Will be massive writeoffs for the next 6-9 months. Don't expect anything positive and Alibaba IPO is most likely postponed until 2015 due to the Bear Market in China. If they IPO this year they will only get 45-55 Billion at most. If they wait Alibaba growth may slow and it could be even less. China is in a world of hurt economically. The smart money knows this and has been exiting Yahoo stock. Right now I suggest you invest in CSIQ and ride the wave up. Yahoo will tread water at best and is most likely headed to low 20's. Things are not looking good for them at this point. So much uncertainty.

Topic.Title: Big time Q2 Report put YHOO to new High

Message.Msg: A simple no. Going lower first but by next summer maybe a break to high 20's. Be patient. Very patient. Or buy CSIQ like I told you at 7. Now over 12 and going much much higher much much sooner than YHOO. Mark my words

Topic.Title: Alibaba IPO will be announced soon

Message.Msg: not many shorts in this stock. Alibaba is a pipe dream right now. Chinese market is deader than a doornail. Not going to happen. The run is over and a lot of big funds are exiting the stock. Accumulation/Distribution is highly negative according to IBD. Shorting would actually be more prudent but being long CSIQ is a better bet to make big bucks. I am also an advocate of ISIS for the long term

Topic.Title: Alibaba IPO will be announced soon

Message.Msg: Personally I accept the reality that you were pumping -buyout this weekend- for over 3 years from the time Microsoft announced they were not buying Yahoo. You have been announcing a short squeeze and shorts are toast with the imminent sale of Yahoo Japan and other Asian assets since July 2008. And a -Taobao IPO soon- from 2008 till you changed it to -Alibaba IPO this month- last year. You have posted numerous predictions every week for almost 6 years without ever being right. And you are considered to be as dumb as a headless chicken by both longs and shorts. Even the spammers and nutcases are held in higher esteem. That is the reality of the situation.

Message.Title: News from Japan
Message.Msg: "Yahoo Japan expects economic growth and a consumer shift to mobile services to spur revenue gains as it targets advertising growth of at least 10 percent. Yahoo Japan is targeting a 77 percent increase in earnings within six years by expanding in e-commerce and offering more services for smartphones and tablet computers. We expect to continue the growth pace a while,” Chief Financial Officer Toshiki Ohya said in an interview in Tokyo. Advertising, which account for more than half the company’s sales, rose 15 percent to 190.5 billion yen ($2 billion) in the year ended March." Bloomberg.
